comment.body:
3 in first line - the most balanced. (say as designer)
and  2 in second line is better if you want be more unified (if you see later your project as a platform (or network protocol) for different developers, not only a one-side project)

Sorry for English, bcs im Russian.
And ofcourse you dont need to match the hexogram and circle in top right corner, because it willbe not good looking. need to change a shape of a button
